our-project-sub: As per today, PT ESI has more than 500 world wide project in Water Management (Water Treatment & Waste Water Treatment).

industrial.title: CETP DHAKA – BANGLADESH – ECR™ T60 x 12 Units (43.000m³/day)
industrial.description: The Dhaka Textile Industry Complex built a central plant with 43,000 m3/day capacity to handle wastewater from numbers of running textile factories.

industrial.title: Uniphos Colombia – ECR™ T20 x 5 Units
industrial.description: The project is situated in Barranquilla, Colombia. The waste water is from the discharge of the agro-chemical industries with capacity 2500 m3/day.

industrial.title: Belgo Beer Brewery, Kizuna 2 - Vietnam
industrial.description: Waste Water Treatment Plant for Beer Brewery Located in Kizuna 2 Industrial Park Vietnam with 2m3/h Capacity. Utilizing ECR as pre-treatment before Membrane Bio Reactors.

industrial.title: PT Bandung Sakura Textill Mills - Bandung
industrial.description: Provision of Waste Water Treatment Plant for Textille Waste Water Located in Bandung, Indonesia with 40 m3/h Capacity. Utilizing Staged Contaminant Removal, using EC, DAF, Aerobic Bio & Multi Media FIlter as polishing.

industrial.title: PT POLYTAMA PROPINDO - BLOWDOWN WATER RECOVERY SYSTEM (BWRS)
industrial.description: The project is situated in Indramayu, Indonesia. Recovery of Blowdown Cooling Tower water into Demin Water Quality with capacity 10 m3/Hour.

industrial.title: PT LABDA ANUGERAH BALI - PRINTING TEXTILLE WASTE WATER
industrial.description: The project is situated in Denpasar Utara, Bali. Provision of Printing Textille waste Water Treatment utilizing Sequenching Batch Reactor (SBR)

industrial.title: i-Land INDUSTRIAL PARK - CETP
industrial.description: The project is situated in Bago, Myanmar . Provision of Central Effluent Treatment Plant (CETP) for various Waste Water within I-Land Industrial park with capacity 20 m3/hr.

industrial.title: SOCIAL SECURITY SYSTEM Inc. - DOMESTIC WASTE WATER
industrial.description: Located in the heart of Manila City, Phillipines. we successfully commissioned a Domestic Waste Water treatment utilizing EC as Retrofit Project with capacity 20 m3/hr.

industrial.title: DAN ERICS GRAND ICE CREAM INC.
industrial.description: Located in the heart of Paranaque City, Phillipines. we successfully commissioned an Ice Cream Waste Water treatment utilizing EC as Retrofit Project with capacity 2 m3/hr.

industrial.title: VERCLEAN - A LAUNDRY WASTE WATER TREATMENT
industrial.description: Located in the heart of Manila City, Phillipines. we successfully commissioned a Laundry Waste Water treatment utilizing EC as Retrofit Project with capacity 2 m3/hr.

oilgas.title: ExxonMobil Cepu Limited
oilgas.description: Provision of Drilling Exploration Waste Water with capacity 1000m3/day.

oilgas.description: Provision of Drilling Exploration Waste Water with 20feet Containerised Mobile unit consist of EC & Membrane System.
